name: Jack Ferguson and The Mask of the Bat God
name_original: Jack Ferguson and The Mask of the Bat God
description:
The adventures of Jack Ferguson continue.

After the Cursed pyramid, here's the second part, The Mask of the Bat God. Like the previous part, it's a retro-style platformer where you have to get the mask of the Mayan bat god while dodging deadly traps.

- 17 scenes to explore

- 11 different traps and enemies

- 5 difficulty settings

- circa 15-20 minutes of gameplay

If you played the game please leave a comment, i really appreciate it!
